message: I wasn't sure if it worked, but a few minutes later...
...Noiz shows up at Hum-Drum Junk.
Koujaku, Clear, Mink, and Noiz.
Getting this ragtag bunch together... It's nothing short of a miracle, really.
Koujaku isn't happy, of course, but he's just going to have to deal with it.
I give Noiz a brief rundown of the situation, to get him up to speed.

name: ノイズ
message: "Isn't Dry Juice the biggest Rib gang?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "There aren't exactly a lot of places on this island you could hide that many people."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."

name: 紅雀
message: "My guys have been searching too, but nothin'."

name: クリア
message: "I checked the rooftops, but nothing there either."

name: ノイズ
message: "So they're someplace hidden."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you mean?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I mean we've gotta consider places that are normally off-limits."

name: ミンク
message: "Exactly. This is why we need an information freak."

name: ノイズ
message: "Who you callin' a freak?"
Mink makes a casual gesture with his pipe.

name: ミンク
message: "Your grandmother was taken north, toward Keisen."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Keisen..."

name: 紅雀
message: "There're a lot of abandoned buildings and warehouses up there."

name: ミンク
message: "Look into it."
Mink thrusts his pipe at Noiz like a general's baton.

name: ノイズ
message: "Since when do I take orders from you?"

name: ミンク
message: "I know you're not helping out of the kindness of your heart. I want things taken care of quickly. Don't you?"
Noiz answers with a sneer, but then opens a screen on his Coil and gets to work.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Hey, why do you get to call the shots?"

name: ミンク
message: "No one else is stepping up."

name: 紅雀
message: "Say what?!"
Just as I'm afraid Koujaku's going to launch himself at Mink, the cockatoo sitting on Mink's shoulder looks up from his preening.

name: トリ
message: "All this shouting is a waste of energy."

name: ベニ
message: "You stay the fuck outta this!"
Beni glares at the cockatoo from Koujaku's shoulder, puffing his feathers up.

name: トリ
message: "They say Allmates resemble their owners."

name: ベニ
message: "The fuck was that?! You think you're hot shit?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Everyone shut up."
Cutting in, Noiz turns his Coil screen around so we can see it.
The screen shows a map of the Old Residential District. There's a blinking red triangle at one end.

name: ノイズ
message: "This is Keisen. I'm getting errors trying to access the network there."

name: ノイズ
message: "Normally, there's no network service at all in restricted areas. But the error logs from this particular spot are full of blank files."

name: ノイズ
message: "Basically, it's fake. Someone's trying to make it look like the network is down."

name: 紅雀
message: "So that's where they are?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Could be. There used to be a garbage processing facility here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's the one they shut down a few years ago, right? It's supposed to be off-limits."

name: 紅雀
message: "I hear people still dump shit there. It's not like anyone's watching."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's where Granny is?"

name: ミンク
message: "It fits with my intel."
It's not definite, but it seems worth checking out.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hold on. We don't know anything about the area. Charging in sounds like suicide."

name: クリア
message: "Actually, I'm quite familiar with that area."

name: 紅雀
message: "...This ain't the time for your jokes."

name: クリア
message: "Of course. I really do know the area. I used to take walks around there all the time."

name: クリア
message: "Huh? What's wrong? Why'd everyone go quiet? Don't tell me you don't believe me."

name: クリア
message: "Oh, please! I really do know the area! I can draw you a map and everything!"
Indignant at our reaction, Clear shoves his hand into his coat pocket and pulls out a pen and paper.

name: クリア
message: "Aaaaaaand... there!"
Clear's pen dances across the paper.

name: クリア
message: "...Done!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh come on, is this thing for real?"

name: ミンク
message: "Compare them."
Mink snatches Clear's map and tosses it at Noiz.

name: ノイズ
message: "...It does match up."

name: 紅雀
message: "So you're saying it's right?"

name: クリア
message: "I told you! You're all so mean!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Well, I guess we don't have to worry about getting lost. Now we just have to go check it out."

name: 紅雀
message: "We have to check it out?"
Koujaku looks at the others with disgust.

name: 紅雀
message: "You mean this buncha freaks? Damn."

name: ノイズ
message: "That's rich, coming from you."

name: 紅雀
message: "Shut the fuck up."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm not matching wavelengths with any of you. If I'm doing this, I'm doing it my way."

name: 紅雀
message: "So we're splitting up? Better not get in my way, kid."

name: ミンク
message: "Sometimes splitting up is the best course of action. Even if we come up with a plan, there's no guarantee everyone will follow it. Especially with this group."

name: 紅雀
message: "That's what I've been saying!"

name: ミンク
message: "I was talking about you and the guy in the gas mask."

name: 紅雀
message: "Say what?!"

name: クリア
message: "Huh? Me?! You're sooooo mean! I just wanna be bestest friends with all of you!"

name: ノイズ
message: "I think I threw up in my mouth a little."

name: クリア
message: "C'moooon!"
...Nope.
I never really thought this was going to work, but this really isn't going to work.
They're not even trying to work together.

name: 紅雀
message: "Yo, gas mask, shut up already! This is annoying enough as it is!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Take your own advice, why don't you."

name: クリア
message: "Oh you guys are so mean! I'm not annoying!"
Here I am, wracking my brain over what to do, and they're bickering like children.
This isn't the time for this shit! Granny might be in serious danger.
We've already figured out where we need to go. We should be on our way already!
But these guys...
These guys...!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Knock it off already!"
I immediately regret my outburst.
It's not like they're going to listen to me anyw―
Suddenly, the bickering stopped.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh... What?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba's right. We need to knock this shit off."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's a total waste of time, anyway."

name: ミンク
message: "Let's move."

name: クリア
message: "Yeah, let's do that."
The atmosphere in the room has done a complete one-eighty. As one, the four men rise from the couch.
Suddenly, they're all on the same page.
...Well, whatever.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Alright. Let's get going."
I collect myself and join them.
Granny... I'm gonna save you.
And Mizuki, and the rest of Dry Juice too.
We leave the shop and head for the north quarter.
